name: Yum-Yum Neck
description:
Submission for the GMTK 2021 with theme: Joined Together.

You control 2 apple-hungry giraffe-bear-people, which share a neck. Try to eat all the apples so the creatures will sing a happy song for you.

Controls

Control your character by alternating between WASD and Arrow keys. The game will show which of the 2 sets of keys is active and which is inactive. Controls switch randomly.

Credits

Original bearman character sprite + animation credit, Segel 2d: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/segel2d

Creators

DudeNamedDaisy: Code, Gamedev, Art and Concept

Cyrion Willems: Music and Concept

Special thanks

All my twitch stream attenders for all the help with figuring out new stuff.
